使用分子检测技术更快、更全面地诊断脑肿瘤癌症研究所癌症登月学者计划旨在推进儿童脑肿瘤的精确诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Using-a-molecular-testing-technology-for-faster-and-compressive-diagnosis-of-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Using-a-molecular-testing-technology-for-faster-and-compressive-diagnosis-of-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21d9daa3-d362-4f2f-a4e4-4e3e365387e1 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 13:44:25 -0500 Using a molecular testing technology for faster and comprehensive diagnosis of brain tumors
重大资金赤字加深了叙利亚的精神健康危机由于内战和自然灾害的影响，叙利亚北部陷入了心理健康危机，自杀率飙升，服务资金短缺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Major-funding-deficit-deepens-Syriae28099s-mental-health-crisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Major-funding-deficit-deepens-Syriae28099s-mental-health-crisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=789048de-5142-4134-8bae-4804d27c52eb Mon, 04 Nov 2024 13:38:47 -0500 Major funding deficit deepens Syria’s mental health crisis

科学家发现酮饮食如何帮助一些多发性硬化症患者科学家们长期以来一直怀疑生酮饮食可能能够平息过度活跃的免疫系统，并帮助一些患有多发性硬化症等疾病的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Scientists-discover-how-the-keto-diet-may-help-some-people-with-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Scientists-discover-how-the-keto-diet-may-help-some-people-with-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=274af40f-a5b6-4c62-9a8e-62db68357a25 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 13:04:13 -0500 Scientists discover how the keto diet may help some people with multiple sclerosis
薄荷醇卷烟的限制可能会带来更健康的选择在全国范围内，吸烟的人比十年前少了，但吸薄荷味卷烟的比例却在上升。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Menthol-香烟-restrictions-could-lead-to-healthier-choices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Menthol-香烟-restrictions-could-lead-to-healthier-choices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5e4379c-1598-4e95-ab12-e5d46ef71d55 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 12:31:54 -0500 Menthol cigarette restrictions could lead to healthier choices
先进的深度学习技术增强脉络膜血管可视化北京大学的研究人员开发了一种新型无创脉络膜血管造影方法，可以利用深度学习对脉络膜血管进行分层可视化和评估。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Advanced-deep-learning-technique-enhances-choroidal-vessel-visualization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Advanced-deep-learning-technique-enhances-choroidal-vessel-visualization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2731631-d17e-45f0-a471-0a10e9207624 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 12:20:52 -0500 Advanced deep learning technique enhances choroidal vessel visualization
100 万美元拨款支持多发性硬化症突破性疗法的研究多发性硬化症 (MS) 是一种使大脑和脊髓衰弱的疾病，影响着全世界数百万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/241-million-grant-supports-research-on-groundwriting-therapies-for-MS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/241-million-grant-supports-research-on-groundwriting-therapies-for-MS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87b92744-fcbc-4754-9056-f016d4f6c688 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 12:08:42 -0500 $1 million grant supports research on groundbreaking therapies for MS

远程口译引起人们对医疗保健领域沟通质量的担忧由于医疗保健行业在 COVID-19 大流行期间严重依赖技术，口译员报告了不同的经历，这引发了人们对远程通信平台在关键医疗环境中的有效性的严重质疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Remote-interpreting-raises-concerns-about-communication-quality-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Remote-interpreting-raises-concerns-about-communication-quality-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2159150c-2c6b-4a4d-ac52-746c118ade54 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 11:13:20 -0500 Remote interpreting raises concerns about communication quality in healthcare
